name: To validate the Cancel state fo Multi-Risk state

testSteps.description: 1: To validate the Cancel state fo Multi-Risk state ({CancelState=California, CancelReason=Non-payment of premium})

children.description: Given underwriter has ability to create Policy for LOB Workers Compensation

And with Company as
| Company |
| Protective Insurance Company |

And with insured address and location details
| StreetAddress | Line2 | City | State | Zip | Country |
| 240 Edith Ave |  | Corning | California | 96021 | United states |

And with ClassCode and AnnualExposure for first Risk State as
| ClassCode | AnnualExposure |
| 0016 | 10000 |

And with second Risk State as
| RiskState |
| Florida |

And with ClassCode and AnnualExposure for the second Risk State as
| ClassCode | AnnualExposure |
| 9139 | 1000000 |
When underwriter cancels the policy with cancel reason as Non-payment of premium
Then Cancel state California should be populated

userStory.storyName: To verify more hidden field Cancel State
userStory.displayName: To verify more hidden field Cancel State
userStory.narrative:
Scenario : Validate the hidden field named as Cancel State
    Given underwriter searches inforce policy
    When underwriter performs Cancellation transaction on that policy
    Then a hidden field named cancel state should display on Quote and insured info screen
